name: Teh Werst Docter Who Gaem Eveer
name_original: Teh Werst Docter Who Gaem Eveer
description:
Entry for the "So bad it's good" jam.

"Features":
- Clumsy controls you can't edit in the menu
- 3-hit deaths. It's really easy to get hit.
- Lo-res and black and white, because bad.
- Insults fans by mixing Doctor Who jargon with Star Trek!
- You can't win. Did I mention 'bad'?
